Because of this, I’m not able to specify a single criterion that would guarantee reconsideration.

If you would like, you may submit an updated application/confirmation of continued interest (and any new relevant information since your last submission), and we will keep it on file while we finalize allocations. In parallel, I would also encourage you to continue pursuing other options, as we cannot promise an offer.

Kind regards,
Nursery_A Admissions
